text:
It is a part of Singapore Agency for Science, Technology & Research.
Has an amazing & successful infrastructure & eco system with a staffing of over 300 engineers. It focuses on applications of advanced manufacturing technologies, systems & capability building.

Very professional. Nice setup.
Training course is good
Interesting place to work and research. Organized and prepared to live and work.
Professional staff. Very interesting research and applied applications.
Excellent center of research and industrial application.
